EmailTemplate.name: LE-04-25-202204-HHS-ENT-SEVT-Becker's-Annual-Meeting-2022.Post Event General No
EmailTemplate.subject: We hope you enjoyed the Becker's Annual Meeting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
WE'RE SORRY WE MISSED YOU Let’s still connect! We were reminded once again at this year’s Becker’s Annual Meeting about the importance of innovation in the healthcare space. It’s truly an exciting time for virtual care, and Teladoc Health is proud to enable virtual services backed by data that help improve care delivery. We strive to deliver high-quality virtual care for every clinical setting and use case, including:
- High-acuity care like stroke and emergent solutions - Inpatient solutions that create patient care efficiencies - Unified, integrated virtual care platform powered by Solo with Microsoft Teams
Learn more about the Teladoc Health vision <[[https://www.teladochealth.com/resources/video/vision/?utm_source=marketing&utm_medium=email&utm_content=hhs&utm_campaign=beckers-annual-2022-post-event]]> About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
